data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Ying-Yong (2017): A new species of the genus Xenophrys (Amphibia: Anura: Megophryidae) from an offshore island in Guangdong Province, southeastern China. Zootaxa 4324 (3): 541-556, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.3.8
